QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Esophagectomy - discharge
QAPair.Answer: You had surgery to remove part, or all, of your esophagus. This is the tube that carries food from the mouth to the stomach. The remaining part of your esophagus and your stomach were rejoined. Now that you're going home, follow your health care provider's instructions on how to care for yourself at home while you heal. Use the information below as a reminder.
